scenarios.description:
5aa 5b j2a j5b d623b/a236/j44 j2a
Using d623 is much more consistant near corner.
Timing on j2a can be rather tight
scenarios.name: Near corner/midscreen 5aa

scenarios.description:
4a 5b j6a j5[b] j66 j5a j6a
AUB limit in corner without d623
a bit tighter on timing/spacing but no alt
skills required
scenarios.name: Corner AUB skilless

scenarios.description:
j5a j6a j5c d623b
High damage air-to-air near corner
scenarios.name: Corner air-to_air d623

scenarios.description:
j5a j6a j5[b] j66 j5a j6a
Another high damage air-to-air near the corner
doesn't require skills, but spacing is more
strict.
scenarios.name: Corner air-to-air skilless

scenarios.description:
j5a j6a a236b/c jd3 j5a j6a
Yet another air-to-air confirm using oni
spirit bomb.
scenarios.name: Corner air-to-air oni spirit bomb

scenarios.description:
j8a a236b/c jd3 j5a j6a
A j8a confirm with oni spirit bomb,
good to know for when j5[b] drops.
scenarios.name: Corner j8a oni spirit bomb

scenarios.description:
5aa a623b hj9 j2a j6c jd9 j6c jd9 j6a
A difficult combo that grants high damage if
done right needs fire oni at level 2.
scenarios.name: Midscreen lvl 2 fire oni

scenarios.description:
hj9 j44 j2a
A simple crossup setup that leads to standard
j2a combos.
scenarios.name: Crossup setup
